Package cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddInstrumentActivity
    Presents a view to the user that allows them to add an Instrument to their profile.
    CreateProfileActivity
    Presents a view to the user that allows them to create a new profile.
    DisplaySearchResultsActivity
    Provides a view container for the results of an ElasticSearch
    EditProfileActivity
    Allows the user to modify their existing profile.
    InstrumentListActivity
    The InstrumentListActivity generates a list of Instruments that are owned, borrowed, or bidded on depending on the spinner selection.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class is the main entry point for the application.
    MenuActivity
    The MenuActivity provides a set of options for the user to click on.
    SearchInstrumentsActivity
    Provides a search bar for the user to makes queries.
    ViewInstrumentActivity
    This view will be completed for project part 5.
    ViewProfileActivity
    ViewProfileActivity provides a screen for the user to view their profiles data, as well as a button to navigate to the EditProfileActivity and a button leading back to the MenuActivity.
